Text:
This is not "The Rift 2012", http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1954972/ , but Rift 2011, http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0875613/.

This happened before when Rift was first released as well.  Hard to believe we still don;t check what we put up as torrents.  The first two minutes show that it's not the new movie, which, incidentally, won't be released in the US until 25 August.

yeah this is that really really bad horror film, not the new "the rift"  

Come on mate, you're better than this usually
